```{r}
#| warning: false
#| message: false
#| echo: false
library(calendR)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggtext)
library(grid)
library(png)

help <- tibble(team = c(rep("U13F", 35),
                        rep("U13U", 35),
                        rep("U12U", 35)),
               day = rep(c("Mon", "Tue", "Wed", "Thu", "Fri", "Sat", "Sun"), 15),
               dove = case_when(team == "U13F" & day == "Mon" ~ "Ubertini",
                                team == "U13F" & day == "Thu" ~ "ArÃ¨",
                                TRUE ~ "Unkwon"),
               x = c(rep(0.1:6.1, 5),
                     rep(0.1:6.1, 5),
                     rep(0.1:6.1, 5)),
               y = c(rep(5.3:1.3, each = 7),
                     rep(5:1, each = 7),
                     rep(4.7:0.7, each = 7)),
               label = case_when(team == "U13F" ~ paste0("<span style='color:MediumSlateBlue'>**",
                                                         team, "**</span>", dove),
                                 team == "U13U" ~ paste0("<span style='color:Magenta'>**",
                                                         team, "**</span>", dove), 
                                 team == "U12U" ~ paste0("<span style='color:IndianRed'>**",
                                                         team, "**</span>", dove)))


calendR(year = 2024,
        month = 5,
        start = "M",
        title = "BCV - Under 12/13 Femminile",
        subtitle = "Maggio 2024") +
geom_richtext(data = help, 
              aes(x, y, label = label))

```


## Calendario mensile

```{r}
#| warning: false
#| message: false
#| echo: false

# Create tibble for the month
u13f <- help |>
    filter(team == "U13F",
           day %in% c("Mon", "Thu")) |>
    slice(2:10)





sampleImage = png::readPNG("../images/BCV.png") %>%
      grid::rasterGrob(interpolate = TRUE)

p1 <- calendR(year = 2024,
        month = 5,
        start = "M",
        title = "BCV - Under 12/13 Femminile",
        subtitle = "Maggio 2024") +
geom_richtext(data = u13f, 
              aes(x, y, label = label)) +
geom_richtext(data = u13u, 
              aes(x, y, label = label)) +
geom_richtext(data = u12u, 
              aes(x, y, label = label))  +coord_cartesian(clip = 'off') +
annotation_custom(sampleImage, x = 1.3, y = 7.2, ymax = 7.7, xmax = 2)

ggsave(p1, filename = "../progAnnuale/sept24.png", units = "mm", width = 297, height = 210, scale = 1.45)

```
